episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including the unusual villains in Chinese wrestling, the unique skill of identifying bell origins by sound, historical strikes in Canadian bowling alleys, and the surprising fact that trees can emit methane, akin to farting.

facts.fact: One of the main villains in China's equivalent of WWE is Steve, the English as a second language teacher.
Expert bell makers can tell where a bell was made just from listening to the bong.
In the 1930s, Canada's bowling alleys had to close on nine occasions due to strikes.
